articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary and follow text updates as Scotland host Norway in their final qualifier with a place in Euro 2024 already secured.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifying: Brown starts in attack as Scotland host Norway

articles.description: Australia stun hosts India in Ahmedabad to win the men's Cricket World Cup for a sixth time.
articles.title: Australia stun India to win sixth World Cup

articles.description: Manchester City bounce back from successive defeats to beat rivals Manchester United at Old Trafford and put their Women's Super League title challenge back on track.
articles.title: City win Manchester derby to boost WSL title hopes

articles.description: World number one Novak Djokovic faces fourth seed Jannik Sinner for the title at the season-ending ATP Finals in Turin, Italy.
articles.title: ATP Finals: Djokovic chasing seventh title against Sinner

articles.description: Max Verstappen criticised the Las Vegas Grand Prix at the beginning of the weekend, but ended it singing "Viva Las Vegas".
articles.title: 'Las Vegas has a

articles.description: Novak Djokovic wins a record seventh ATP Finals title with a dominant victory over Jannik Sinner in Turin
articles.title: Djokovic wins record seventh ATP Finals title

articles.description: Watch the best shots from Travis Head's unbeaten 50 for Australia against India in the Cricket World Cup final in Ahmedabad.
articles.title: Head's unbeaten 50 puts Australia in strong position

articles.description: Watch highlights as Australia beat India by six-wickets in the Cricket World Cup final in Ahmedabad to claim their sixth World Cup title.
articles.title: Australia beat India to win their sixth Cricket World Cup

articles.description: Australia are worthy of comparison to the legendary sides of the 1990s and early 2000s after "the most incredible World Cup victory", says Michael Vaughan.
articles.title: Australia win 'one of the great World Cup victories'

articles.description: Henry Slade earns Exeter Chiefs a dramatic late win against Gloucester by slotting a penalty with the final kick of the game.
articles.title: Slade kicks Exeter to dramatic win over Gloucester
